arena.title: Arena
arena.tip: Swipe or tap for new challenge

fate.item1: Anyone with an even birthday drinks 1 sip.
fate.item2: Roll your fate: draw one more challenge.
fate.item3: Person to your left drinks 2 sips.

seduce.item3: Send a heart emoji to a player.

confess.item3: Who did you last stalk online?

shame.item1: Show your oldest phone photo (if ok) — else drink 2.
shame.item2: Read your last sent message (if ok) — else drink 2.
shame.item3: Hold a silly pose for one round.

fate.item1: Choose a person to drink 2 sips.
fate.item3: The person to your right drinks 3 sips.

truth.item1: Tell us about your most embarrassing moment.
truth.item2: Who was your first big love?
truth.item3: What bad habit do you have?
truth.item5: Who among us is the most attractive?

dare.item5: Exchange a piece of clothing with someone else.

funny.1: Imitate an animal of your choice for 30 seconds!
funny.3: Sing 'Happy Birthday' in the style of an opera singer!
funny.4: Describe the last meal you ate as if it were the best dish in the world!
funny.5: Have a dialogue between your two hands!

mythology.1: Embody Zeus and thunder a mighty command with your voice!
mythology.2: Tell an epic story of the last battle like Odin!
mythology.3: Perform a ritual dance as an Egyptian Pharaoh!
mythology.4: Speak like a wise Greek philosopher about the meaning of life!
mythology.5: Create a song about the elements as a Nordic shaman!

sports.2: Imitate a goal celebration like a football world champion!
sports.3: Do 30 seconds of shadow boxing against an invisible opponent!
sports.4: Perform an Olympic victory ceremony for yourself!
sports.5: Explain a complicated sports rule as if you were a TV commentator!

creativity.1: Invent a new word and explain its meaning!
creativity.2: Draw your dream house in the air with your eyes closed!
creativity.3: Spontaneously compose a 30-second song about your day!
creativity.4: Invent a new greeting for aliens!
creativity.5: Create a superhero identity and introduce yourself!
